title: Onigiri Power
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>You did a good job, You-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Wah, Hanayo-chan! You came to see me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah. I’ve never been to a high diving tournament before, but I’m really excited. Everyone is so good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, thank you. It’s the kind of competition where everyone practices real hard, so it wouldn’t be weird for anyone to win.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>You’re right.... But, I want you to win, You-san. That’s why, if you’d like, I’ve prepared some refreshments for you.... Here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>What is it? Let’s see.... Waah, onigiri! It’s huge, huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I put side dishes inside the onigiri. I thought it would be easier to eat that way....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I see, very convenient.... Thank you, Hanayo-chan! Rice is great because it turns into energy really quickly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe, I’m glad. Then, do your best in the second half too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I will! I’ll claim victory with the power of onigiri!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
